director.name: Lieven Van Baelen Lieven Van Baelen

introduction: A long-haired man in the desert. He rides a bike and by that draws a red line behind him on the ground. It is a line that may not be crossed... Our hero meets a weird man that drives him crazy, a really annoying guy that the bike rider can't get rid of. And finally there is someone else he meets. A man that seems to be a friend. Some words are exchanged, then the long-haired bike rider is alone again. Or is he not?The pictures in this short film are great. Unusual angles and cool perspectives. The cutting is excellent as well. Not to mention the story that is exciting and different.
